TestDescription.name: Padding oracle attack

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

Reference.database: Automated Padding Oracle Attacks with PadBuster

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]Manual confirmation is required for this alert.[/dark][/coolbox][break] This script is possibly vulnerable to a Padding Oracle Attack. At Eurocrypt 2002, Vaudenay introduced a powerful side-channel attack, which is called padding oracle attack, against CBC-mode encryption with PKCS#5 padding. If there is an oracle which on receipt of a ciphertext, decrypts it and then replies to the sender whether the padding is correct or not, Vaudenay shows how to use that oracle to efficiently decrypt data without knowing the encryption key.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can decrypt ciphertext without knowing the encryption key.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Consult Web References for more information about the padding oracle attack.
